Class TreeNode

java.lang.Object
TreeNode
public class TreeNode extends Object
this class will store the the information in each node. A node will store a word for the dictionary, which will be a binary tree.

    • addNode

      public void addNode(TreeNode newNode)
      method used to add a new node to the end of current node. NOTE: this method does not traverse the tree, another method must be set up in Tree.java for that task.
      Parameters:
      newNode - the new node, as set up in add() in Tree.java
